question:
In November, the Guruprasad Mohapatra Development Council was set up. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. It was set up by the ministry of heavy industries.
  2. It is look into the development of premium bicycles.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Guruprasad Mohapatra Development Council was set up in November by the Ministry of Commerce and Industry at the centre. It is a council of the department for promotion of industry and internal trade or DPIIT. It is headed by the secretary of DPIIT (Guruprasad Mohapatra). Â Statement 2 is correct: The development council will look into ways to develop the bicycle industry. It will deal with the designing, engineering and manufacturing planning. The council will function for 2 years to focus on achieving safe, light, fast, smart and value added bicycles that would be targeted at both domestic and international market.
